'''''Adventure Rank Ascension 2''''' is a [[World Quest]] that increases the player's [[World Level]] to Level 4. The quest is automatically obtained upon reaching Adventure Rank 35.

==Steps==
{{Quest Description|The [[Adventurers' Guild]] has posted an emergency relic commission. The performance of the adventurer that takes up the challenge will affect their ranking within the guild. Take your next step towards the stars and the abyss.}}
#Enter the ruins
#* Enter [[Midsummer Courtyard]]'s Quest Domain: [[Ascend: Clear the Ruins]]
#Clear the ruins

==Rewards from the Ruins==
{{Card|Hero's Wit|4}}
{{Card|Mystic Enhancement Ore|10}}
{{Card|Liyue Shrine of Depths Key|3}}
*1 Luxurious [[chest]]

==Enemies==
* Enemy Level: 60
{{Transclude|Ascend: Clear the Ruins|Ascension Quest 2}}
